title: Designing Equity in Mathematics Education through Digital Platforms: Realizing Formative Justice

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environments, project-centered assessment, and learner-tailored approaches emphasizing educational equity

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement individualized mathematical problem-solving strategies via digital platforms.
Learners can propose measures to enhance educational equity using a peer feedback system.
Learners can present a digital educational resource allocation plan from a formative justice perspective as a project deliverable.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
